statements: SELECT * FROM RecipeModifications;
SELECT recipe_id, modification_description FROM RecipeModifications WHERE adjustment_id = '1234';
SELECT recipe_id, modification_description, modification_timestamp FROM RecipeModifications WHERE modification_id = '5678';
SELECT * FROM RecipeModifications WHERE adjustment_timestamp >= '2022-01-15' ORDER BY recipe_id;
SELECT recipe_id, adjustment_id, adjustment_description FROM RecipeModifications WHERE modification_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM RecipeModifications WHERE adjustment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY modification_timestamp DESC;

SELECT recipe_id, modification_description FROM RecipeModifications WHERE modification_description LIKE '%substitution%' AND adjustment_description LIKE '%increase%' ORDER BY adjustment_timestamp ASC;
SELECT modification_description, adjustment_description FROM RecipeModifications WHERE recipe_id = '321e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND adjustment_id = '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT recipe_id FROM RecipeModifications WHERE modification_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND adjustment_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_modifications FROM RecipeModifications WHERE modification_id = '789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM recipe_versions;
SELECT recipe_name, modification_timestamp FROM recipe_versions ORDER BY modification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE unit='g';
SELECT recipe_name, modification_timestamp FROM recipe_versions WHERE modified_by='Alice';
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipe_ingredients ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, modified_by, modification_timestamp FROM recipe_versions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipe_versions INNER JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipe_versions.id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_version_id;
SELECT recipe_name, COUNT(*) AS ingredient_count FROM recipe_versions INNER JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipe_versions.id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_version_id GROUP BY recipe_name;

SELECT recipe_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM recipe_versions INNER JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipe_versions.id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_version_id GROUP BY recipe_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM recipe_history ORDER BY modification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, modification_timestamp, modification_description FROM recipe_history WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_id, modification_description FROM recipe_history WHERE modification_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT recipe_id, modification_description FROM recipe_history WHERE modification_description LIKE '%updated%';
SELECT ingredient_id, recipe_id, quantity, unit FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE recipe_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM recipe_history ORDER BY modification_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT recipe_id, modification_description FROM recipe_history WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT modification_timestamp, modification_description FROM recipe_history WHERE modification_description LIKE '%update%';
SELECT recipe_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM recipe_ingredients GROUP BY recipe_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT recipe_id, step_number, instruction_description FROM recipe_instructions WHERE recipe_id = 2 ORDER BY step_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipe_modifications;
SELECT modification_description, timestamp, recipe_id FROM recipe_modifications WHERE modification_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating FROM recipe_reviews WHERE recipe_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT tag_name, recipe_id FROM recipe_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE '%healthy%';
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE recipe_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM recipe_modifications WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_id, modification_description FROM recipe_modifications WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE recipe_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT tag_name FROM recipe_tags;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, review_description FROM recipe_reviews WHERE recipe_id = 3 AND rating >= 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT recipe_name FROM recipe_history;
SELECT * FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE ingredient_name = 'Salt';
SELECT recipe_name, modification_timestamp FROM recipe_history ORDER BY modification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipe_modifiers WHERE modifier_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT r.recipe_name, ri.ingredient_name, rs.step_description FROM recipe_history r, recipe_ingredients ri, recipe_steps rs WHERE r.recipe_id = 1 AND ri.ingredient_id = 1 AND rs.step_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recipe_history;
SELECT recipe_name, modification_timestamp FROM recipe_history ORDER BY modification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE ingredient_name LIKE 'Tomato%';
SELECT recipe_name, modifier_name FROM recipe_modification_log JOIN recipe_modifiers ON recipe_modification_log.modifier_id = recipe_modifiers.modifier_id;
SELECT recipe_name, modification_timestamp FROM recipe_history WHERE recipe_id = 1;
